The directory 2.24.0 contains library Voice Path API Lite version 2.24
from Microsemi.

The library can be used in open source project according to a Microsemi
representative :
>> ...
>> We have two API versions available to control the voice chipset :
>>
>> 1. The LE71SK0002 VOICEPATH API-II SOFTWARE that requires Software Licence agreement to be signed by Legal that cannot be distributed for GPL
>> 2. The LE71SDKAPIL API-II Lite that doesn't require any Legal document and can be distributed as GPL
>> ...
